name: Duolingo New Lessons Fix
description:
Not everyone loves the redesigned lessons. Here's a bit of an old school look, boxed for less negative space, changed colours and font sizes for easier readability and the questions are next to the textarea again and a few other changes.

Discussion on Duo: https://www.duolingo.com/comment/24634938
additional_info:
21 Mar 18 - adding functionality during placement tests

23 Nov 17 - hiding the scrollbars for multiple choice questions if they are not needed
15 Nov 17 - small update for multiple choice questions
13 Oct 17 - Updated for the new classes after duo added Japanese and Korean to the web.
11 Oct 17 - Centred the picture exercises
04 Oct 17 - Fixed overlap on smaller screens. and restricted it to the the practice and skill pages.
28 Sept 17  - Fixed some spacing problems with longer sentences.

style_settings.label: Where do you want to have your input field?

style_settings.label: Where do you want the hover-tips to show up?
